name: listfailure
author: me
command-line: echo this is a [list] and this is a [file] [storexyz]
description: A relatively small example to demo how file lists are distorted by cbrain. Steps to reproduce: import to cbrain. Upload a few files. Start a task with two arbitrary file. After fininsh check task details. Observe the command line has file name dublication issues

inputs.description: Some file list. Could be e.g. the list of files with fMRI data to analyze.
inputs.name: files (with fMRI data_

inputs.description: A single file, e.g. a grey-matter mask.
inputs.name: a file

output-files.description: A pointless folder it is needed to allow cbrain integration
output-files.name: Output folder
